law.catch_line: Establishment of base salaries for principals.
law.text: The principal of an area vocational education center or state vocational technical school shall be paid a base monthly salary, which is at least equal to the highest paid teacher supervised by the principal, when the education and experience of the principal is equal to or greater than that of the supervised employee.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 594, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 267, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1988.
